descriptions.modules: Modules Manager. Here you can install/uninstall modules from remote storage. The dependencies between the modules and the Treo system are supported.
descriptions.extensions: Extensions Manager. Here you can install/uninstall extension by zip archive.

messages.upgradeVersion: Treo System will be upgraded to version {version}. Please be patient as this may take a while.
messages.upgradeDone: Treo System has been upgraded to version {version}.
messages.upgradeBackup: We recommend making a backup of your Treo System files and data before upgrading.
messages.newVersionIsAvailable: New Treo System version {latestVersion} is available.
messages.cronIsNotRunning: Cron jobs are not running. Go to the Scheduled Jobs for details.
